rows.label: tev065501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Gi Nogan about the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Gi Nogan about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Gi Nogan about enemies in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Gi Nogan if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Gi Nogan about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Gi Nogan about the Wrothians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Gi Nogan about the Wrothians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG0001
rows.name:
You expect me to parley with one who could be either
friend or foe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG0002
rows.name: Save your questions. Now is not the time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG0007
rows.name:
I have seen nothing suspicious of late,
save perhaps for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG0008
rows.name:
If you attempt any nonsense inside, prepare to be cut
down as the dog you are. You have been warned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG0013
rows.name:
The electromagnetic storms that frequent these lands
wreak havoc on the Ganglion's sensors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG0014
rows.name:
As it was explained to me, the mechanical soldiers
lose their ability to track enemies as a result.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG0015
rows.name:
When I had to fight alongside them, the machines'
unreliability was a constant thorn in my side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG0016
rows.name:
But now that I stand against the Ganglion,
this weakness has become a great boon that I can
exploit during covert operations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG0021
rows.name:
It has fallen on me of late to explore the northwest
portions of Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG0022
rows.name:
I had hoped to ask a good friend for help, but he was
busy making preparations to face an old foe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG0023
rows.name:
This friend, Da Naguth, eldest brother of the Three
Talons, has always been like family to me.
I have cared for him since he was little.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG0024
rows.name:
And now the time has come for him to battle his foe...
I pray we are both spared death and can return home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1001
rows.name:
That schematic you helped me seize earned me praise
from Prince Jiarg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1002
rows.name:
Zo Zinath is deciphering it. If you are curious,
you should have a word with him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1003
rows.name:
Shamefully, I have never had a gift for engineering or
machinery.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1004
rows.name:
Zo Zinath scolds me and says I must train the muscles
in my brain, not just the rest of them. As if it comes
that easily to everyone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1005
rows.name:
Still, considering the technology our enemy possesses,
he is right. I must do better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1006
rows.name: I must ask Zo Zinath to instruct me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1011
rows.name:
I have a friend, Da Naguth, who is the eldest brother
of the Three Talons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1012
rows.name:
And now he has finally struck down his enemy of many
long years![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1013
rows.name:
As he has always been like a younger brother to me,
I take some pride in the fact—but I must not trumpet it
too loudly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1014
rows.name:
The victory is his—and as equals, we must better
each other and bring a glorious future to Wroth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1019
rows.name:
I had a friend, Da Naguth, who was the eldest brother
of the Three Talons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1020
rows.name:
He went to strike down a rival of many long years,
but died in the attempt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1021
rows.name:
We were not of the same blood, but I cared for him
like a younger brother. The loss is devastating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065501_MSG1022
rows.name:
At least he met his end in a way his brothers can be
proud of—with Wrothian strength and valor![ST:wait ]
